item.title: Inkscape command line on the Mac
item.description: I have been testing out the Inskscape command line tool for the last few days and thought I would share a small tip. On the Mac the command line tools are accessed via an executable inside the Inskscape .app package. It doesn’t load any binaries so you have to call it with the path to the Inkscape application.
